channel.title: Moparcraft
channel.description: I am not being rude but do you mind telling me what moparcrafts mc server is ran on? like the specs of the vps/computer? Because i do not lag 1 bit on Mopar but on other servers i lag like shit??

item.title: Moparcraft
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Quad core Intel Xeon E5410 @ 2.33GHz, 16 GB of RAM
It may have been upgraded (likely to be the RAM) but it’s definitley that at the least.

But you must also consider how many other things are also running on the machine synchronously.

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft
item.dc:creator: @noobs_are_ftw noobs are ftw
item.description:
@noobs_are_ftw wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:3, topic:409274”]But some people lag on mopar but are fine on other servers. I think it mostly depends on your location and the number of hops taken to reach the server. I also remember reading once that it’s not uncommon getting a better connection to a server in a different country if a more efficient and better quality route is taken.

When the server gets above 10 players I usually start getting some lag.[/quote]

i never lag on moparcraft unless im in an area with alot of redstone stuff in the area

Read full topic

item.title: Moparcraft
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

But some people lag on mopar but are fine on other servers. I think it mostly depends on your location and the number of hops taken to reach the server. I also remember reading once that it’s not uncommon getting a better connection to a server in a different country if a more efficient and better quality route is taken.

When the server gets above 10 players I usually start getting some lag.

Read full topic
